description.en: The MINISFORUM NAB6 Lite is powered by the Intel Core i5-12600H processor, offering 12 cores and 16 threads with a boost clock up to 4.5 GHz. Designed for versatility, it features dual Ethernet ports, 100W PD support, and a high-efficiency cooling system with dual heat pipes. Connectivity includes 4 USB Type-A, 3 USB Type-C ports, dual HDMI, and support for up to four 4K@60Hz displays. Its compact design allows easy upgrades without tools, making it ideal for both office and multimedia use.
description.es: El MINISFORUM NAB6 Lite está impulsado por el procesador Intel Core i5-12600H, con 12 núcleos y 16 hilos, alcanzando hasta 4.5 GHz. Cuenta con dos puertos Ethernet, soporte PD de 100W y un sistema de refrigeración con tubos de calor duales. Ofrece 4 puertos USB Type-A, 3 USB Type-C, dos HDMI y soporta hasta cuatro pantallas 4K@60Hz. Su diseño compacto facilita actualizaciones sin herramientas, ideal para oficina y multimedia.
